keyPolicies.policyDescription: Scrap the bedroom tax. No more social housing sold. Building through unused government land. Focus on brownfield sites for housebuilding. Plans for grandparent annexe housing.
Grammar schools. More time for teacher training with smaller classes. More academies and free schools. Scrap tuition fees for Science, Tech, Engineering, Maths, and Medical students.
More investment for elderly care and Alzheimer's research. An elected county health board to decide on local health priorities. Reduction of middle management. Stop paying for health tourists.
Control of the volume and quality of immigration using a points-based system similar to the Australian style points-based system.
No interference in other countries' conflicts or sending our troops unless it is to protect our own interests. Utilize resources to defend the realm.
Life means life particularly for the murderers and child sex offenders. Tackle police numbers and all forms of crime including antisocial behaviour.
Responsibly protecting the environment without crushing economic and tax payer burdens. Zero tolerance of dog fouling and dog aggression. Desiganted BBQ areas.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Digital Economy, Global Educational Community and Connectivity
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Establishment of the digital economy. The flagship EC Enterprise Business Incubator Community to help start up businesses directly out of school or as an alternative to the dole.

issues.brexitEurope: Britain slowly being relegated to being just one of the 'United States' of Europe, manipulated by unelected, undemocratic commissioners in Brussels.
issues.education: More grammar schools. More time for teacher training with smaller classes.
issues.health: More investment for elderly care and Alzheimer's research.
issues.immigration: Control of the volume and quality of immigration using a points-based system.

housing.content: Scrap the bedroom tax. No more social housing sold off. Building through unused government land. Plans for grandparent annexe housing.
